articles.utils module

articles.utils.create_reset_token(user)[source]

Create a single-use reset token for a user. Returns the RAW token (caller sends it to the user). Old tokens for this user are deleted to reduce surface.

Return type:

str

articles.utils.build_reset_url(request, raw_token)[source]

Build absolute URL with the RAW token in path.

Return type:

str

articles.utils.validate_and_consume_token(raw_token)[source]

Return (user, token_obj) if valid and not expired/used; marks as used. Return (None, None) if invalid.

articles.utils.lookup_reset_token(raw_token)[source]

Validate existence/expiry/unused WITHOUT consuming it. Returns (user, rt) if valid; (None, None) otherwise.

articles.utils.consume_reset_token(rt)[source]

Mark the token as used (single-use).
